creator: De Vries, David
title: Mezzanine plan and north elevation.  San Bernardino Valley Union Junior College, library building.  Also includes interior elevation of wall between windows, showing light receptacle and section through beam.  Howard E. Jones, Architect, San Bernardino, California.  Sheet 3, job no. 315.  Scales 1/8 inch to the foot (plan, elevation) and 1/2 inch to the foot (interior elevation).  No date given on sheet (probably March or April, 1927). - San Bernardino Valley College, Library, 701 South Mount Vernon Avenue, San Bernardino, San Bernardino County, CA
